CustomField.formula: IF($Setup.DMAPP__Dealmaker_AM_Settings__c.DMAPP__Use_Quantity_In_Market_Landscape__c, IF (ISNULL(DMAPP__Unit_Solution__r.DMAPP__Wallet_Quantity__c), NULL, IF (DMAPP__Unit_Solution__r.DMAPP__Wallet_Quantity__c == 0, 0, DMAPP__Wallet_Quantity__c / DMAPP__Unit_Solution__r.DMAPP__Wallet_Quantity__c ) ) , IF (ISNULL(DMAPP__Unit_Solution__r.DMAPP__Wallet_Size__c), NULL, IF (DMAPP__Unit_Solution__r.DMAPP__Wallet_Size__c == 0, 0, DMAPP__Wallet_Value__c / DMAPP__Unit_Solution__r.DMAPP__Wallet_Size__c ) ) )
CustomField.label: Wallet Perc
